messages.content: Hi
Hey there! To ensure we can connect if we get disconnected, can you please share your email address?
My email is ahmad2720000@gmail.com
Thanks a ton for sharing your email, Ahmad! Could you please tell me a bit about what kind of sign you're looking for — and any other details you'd like us to know?
I need a 4 by 4 metal sign

Gotcha! A 4 by 4 metal sign sounds awesome! To create an accurate mockup and quote, I just need a few more details. 

What material preferences do you have for the sign — like metal, acrylic, or something else?
Metal

Totally get it! Metal it is. 

Now, where will this sign be installed? On a brick wall, concrete, drywall, or another type of surface?
Brick wall

That's perfect! A brick wall is a great choice for a sign. 

Do you have any deadlines or specific dates by which you need the sign to be delivered? Our standard turnaround time is fifteen to seventeen business days.
In 30 days

Perfect — we'll make sure it's delivered on time! 

Is the sign going to be installed indoors or outdoors?
Outdoors

Awesome! An outdoor sign will definitely make a statement. 

Now, in which city and state do you want the sign to be delivered?
Tuijana Mexico

Gotcha! Tijuana, Mexico it is. 

Do you have a price point or a budget in mind for this sign?

That's great to hear! A budget of $1000 gives us some good options to work with. 

Do you have any existing logo files or design elements you'd like to incorporate into your sign? If so, please upload them so our designers can work with your brand assets.
I've uploaded my logo: Screenshot 2025-05-30 160926.png

Thanks a ton for uploading your logo! That'll definitely help our designers create something awesome for you. 

Now, are there any specific colors, fonts, or styles you prefer for the sign?
nOPE

All good! It sounds like you're open to suggestions. 

Just to wrap things up, do you have any additional design elements or features that should be included in the sign, like specific text or images?
nO

That's perfect! Thank you for clarifying that. 

To summarize, we have your sign details: it's a 4 by 4 feet metal sign for outdoor installation on a brick wall, needed in 30 days, with a budget of $1000. You've also uploaded your logo and are open to design suggestions. 

Any changes in the requirement?
nO

Awesome! So, just to confirm, we have everything we need to get started on your sign design. 

Before we wrap up, do you need assistance with any specific regulations or permits required for outdoor signage in Tijuana, Mexico?
nO

Gotcha! Thanks for confirming that. 

Lastly, would you like us to contact you for any further design discussions or approvals as we work on your mockup?
No

Alrighty! Thanks for letting me know. 

Just one last thing—do you have any specific delivery instructions or preferences for the sign once it's completed?
No

Thanks for that! So, just to recap, we have your sign details all set: a 4 by 4 feet metal sign for outdoor installation on a brick wall, needed in 30 days, with a budget of $1000, and your logo uploaded. 

Our designers will create a mockup based on these details, and you can expect it very shortly. 

Thank you so much for your time! If you have any questions or need anything else, feel free to reach out. Have a great day!
